This system must then transmit the product data to a specified endpoint. The solution will be intricately integrated with our platform, [REDACTED_URL] facilitating retailers to list their products as part of a broader marketplace. Furthermore, this system will support online sales by generating a product feed through initial inventory synchronization.#### Key Features and Requirements:1. **Versatile Hardware Compatibility**: The hardware setup, utilizing Raspberry Pi or Arduino, must be adaptable to work with a wide range of barcode scanners, supporting various connection types (USB, serial, etc.). The software should send processed data to a designated endpoint along with the retailer's store ID, and be capable of initial inventory alignment for creating an online sales-ready product feed.3. **Seamless Platform Integration**: The system should integrate flawlessly with [www.caleffionline.it]([REDACTED_URL] allowing for straightforward product listing and management by retailers.
